title: Shift click filename autopaste
body: Something that has always made me go "Hmm, why didn't they make that a feature" in other console and including the CMD in windows. When clicking a file name or holding ctrl, alt or shift and clicking the file name I'd love it if it filled the name in at the cursor immediately. That way I can work quickly with large weirdly named file names without having to copy/paste the file name itself.
